Sports and Clubs: Rifle Shooting; Private pilot licence holder; and Member, All India National Rifle Association,
Social And Cultural Activities: Working for the water supply in the rural and urban areas; create awareness among people about the importance of education and encourage primarily children and women to be educated;to arrange blood donation and health check up camps; to help NGO`s and social workers in fighting against social evils; and to work for the development of the villages.
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Listening to music, reading newspaper and religious books as well as meeting people
Special Interests: Agricultural activites; acquiring information about latest technological development in the field of agriculture and making the farmer aware of them;and working for the upliftment of the downtrodden people of society.
Educational Qualifications: B.A., LL.B. Educated at Maharshi Dayanand University, Rohtak, Haryana
Other Information: , Haryana State Kisan Congress since, 1998; , All India Freedom Fighter Successor association (Haryana Pradesh) since 2008; and Distt. Congress Committee, Sonepat, since 2002; Father Late Shri Rajinder Singh had been Minister of Health, Food Supplies and Civil Aviation, Haryana; Grandfather Late Shri Lahri Singh had been the Minister of Irrigation & Power, United Punjab
Name: Malik,Shri Jitender Singh
Positions Held:
1995-2000
Member, Zila Parishad, Sonepat

2000-2009
Member, Haryana Legislative Assembly (two terms)

2004-2005
Member, Public Accounts Committee, Haryana Vidhan Sabha

2005-2009
Member, Committee on Public Undertaking Corporation, Haryana Vidhan Sabha

2009
Elected to 15th Lok Sabha
Member, Consultative Committe on Law and Justice

31 Aug. 2009
Member, Committee on Home Affairs

23 Sep. 2009
Member, Committee on Subordinate Legislation
